errors.name: OracleNoPriceData
errors.msg: Oracle did not yield a price within the configured age window.

errors.name: OracleExponent
errors.msg: Failed to scale native oracle decimal type to expected exponent.

errors.name: OracleNegativePrice
errors.msg: Oracle yielded a negative price which can't be unsigned.

errors.name: OraclePriceRange
errors.msg: Calculation under/overflow while computing oracle price range.

errors.name: NegativeTime
errors.msg: Encountered a negative clock or oracle publish time.

errors.name: TimeUnderflow
errors.msg: Integer underflow while computing time delta.

errors.name: LevercoinNav
errors.msg: Arithmetic error while computing levercoin NAV.

errors.name: LevercoinRedeemDisabled
errors.msg: Cannot redeem levercoin due to stability mode. NAV would be 0 or lower.

errors.name: StablecoinNav
errors.msg: Arithmetic error while computing depegged stablecoin NAV.

errors.name: LstToToken
errors.msg: Arithmetic error in conversion from LST to protocol token.

errors.name: TokenToLst
errors.msg: Arithmetic error in conversion from protocol token to LST.

errors.name: StableToLever
errors.msg: Arithmetic error in conversion from stablecoin to levercoin.

errors.name: LeverToStable
errors.msg: Arithmetic error in conversion from levercoin to stablecoin.

errors.name: LeverToStableDisabled
errors.msg: Levercoin to stablecoin swap disabled due to stability mode.

errors.name: SanctumCpi
errors.msg: Error during CPI to Sanctum LST/SOL calculator.

errors.name: LstRegistryEmpty
errors.msg: LST specific accounts found empty when attempting to load registry.

errors.name: LstRegistryPreamble
errors.msg: Sanctum calculator contexts in LST registry preamble are malformed.

errors.name: LstRegistryLookupTableDeser
errors.msg: Failed to deserialize registry lookup table.

errors.name: LstRegistryLookupTableInvalid
errors.msg: Contents of LST registry did not match remaining_accounts.

errors.name: LstBlockInvalid
errors.msg: Mint/vault/pool accounts in registry block do not match header.

errors.name: LstContextInvalid
errors.msg: Attempted to register an LST with invalid Sanctum context accounts.

errors.name: LstAdditionOverflow
errors.msg: Addition overflow while computing total SOL in LST registry.

errors.name: LstPriceOutdated
errors.msg: Cached LST price not from current epoch. Run pricing crank to update.

errors.name: LstPriceDelta
errors.msg: Failed to compute delta between current and previous LST prices.

errors.name: LstPriceEpochsInvalid
errors.msg: Found current epoch less than previous in LST header.

errors.name: LstSolAppreciation
errors.msg: Overflow while computing LST SOL appreciation.

errors.name: LstSolConversion
errors.msg: Overflow while computing LST SOL price conversion.

errors.name: FeeExtraction
errors.msg: Over/underflow while computing fee extraction for transaction.

errors.name: CollateralRatio
errors.msg: Overflow while computing collateral ratio.

errors.name: TotalValueLocked
errors.msg: Overflow while computing total value locked in USD.

errors.name: StablecoinMintDisabled
errors.msg: Stablecoin mint disabled. Protoocol is in Mode2 or Depeg.

errors.name: LevercoinMintDisabled
errors.msg: Levercoin mint disabled. Protocol is in Depeg.

errors.name: RequestedStablecoinOverMaxMintable
errors.msg: Requested amount of stablecoin over max mintable limit.

errors.name: StabilityValidation
errors.msg: Stability modes failed validation.

errors.name: YieldHarvestConfigValidation
errors.msg: Yield harvest configuration percentages failed validation.

errors.name: YieldHarvestDisabled
errors.msg: Yield harvest disabled due to protocol collateral ratio.

errors.name: YieldHarvestAllocation
errors.msg: Arithmetic error while computing yield harvest allocation.

errors.name: YieldHarvestEpoch
errors.msg: Yield harvest already occurred during this epoch.

errors.name: MaxMintable
errors.msg: Arithmetic error while computing max mintable stablecoin.

errors.name: MaxSwappable
errors.msg: Arithmetic error while computing max swappable stablecoin.

errors.name: TargetCollateralRatioTooLow
errors.msg: Unable to compute max mintable stablecoin with target CR < 1.

errors.name: NoValidStablecoinMintFee
errors.msg:
No valid mint fee for stablecoin. Projected stability mode is Mode2 or \
     Depeg.

errors.name: NoValidLevercoinMintFee
errors.msg: No valid mint fee for levercoin. Projected stability mode is Depeg.

errors.name: NoValidLeverToStableSwapFee
errors.msg:
No valid mint fee for lever to stable swap. Projected stability mode \
     Mode2 or Depeg.

errors.name: NoValidLevercoinRedeemFee
errors.msg: No valid redeem fee for levercoin due to Depeg.

errors.name: NoNextStabilityThreshold
errors.msg: There is no next stability threshold; current mode is Depeg.

errors.name: CannotIncrementTotalSolCache
errors.msg:
Cannot increment TotalSolCache due to epoch difference. Run price update \
     crank to reset.

errors.name: CannotDecrementTotalSolCache
errors.msg:
Cannot decrement TotalSolCache due to epoch difference. Run price update \
     crank to reset.

errors.name: IncrementOverflowTotalSolCache
errors.msg: Increment overflow in TotalSolCache.

errors.name: DecrementUnderflowTotalSolCache
errors.msg: Decrement underflow in TotalSolCache.

errors.name: OutdatedTotalSolCache
errors.msg:
TotalSolCache is not valid for the current epoch. Run price update crank \
     to reset.

errors.name: DestinationFeeSol
errors.msg: Over/underflow while computing total SOL for destination fee.

errors.name: DestinationFeeStablecoin
errors.msg: Over/underflow while computing total stablecoin for destination fee.

errors.name: ZeroRedeem
errors.msg: Cannot withdraw amount of 0 in a redemption action.

errors.name: ZeroMint
errors.msg: Cannot deposit amount of 0 in a minting action.

errors.name: ZeroSwap
errors.msg: Cannot swap amount of 0.

types.name: FeePair
docs: Represents the spread of fees between mint and redeem for protocol tokens.
All fees must be in basis points to represent a fractional percentage
directly applicable to a token amount e.g. `0.XXXX` or `bips x 10^-4`.

types.name: LstHeader
docs: Header for a specific LST. Should be the first entry in the block of
accounts, and contains references to the rest of the accounts.

types.name: LstSolPrice
docs: Captures the true LST price in SOL for the current epoch.

fields.name: publish_time
docs: The timestamp of this price update in seconds

fields.name: prev_publish_time
docs: The timestamp of the previous price update. This field is intended to allow users to
identify the single unique price update for any moment in time:
for any time t, the unique update is the one such that prev_publish_time < t <= publish_time.
Note that there may not be such an update while we are migrating to the new message-sending logic,
as some price updates on pythnet may not be sent to other chains (because the message-sending
logic may not have triggered). We can solve this problem by making the message-sending mandatory
(which we can do once publishers have migrated over).
Additionally, this field may be equal to publish_time if the message is sent on a slot where
where the aggregation was unsuccesful. This problem will go away once all publishers have
migrated over to a recent version of pyth-agent.

types.name: PriceUpdateV2
docs: A price update account. This account is used by the Pyth Receiver program to store a verified price update from a Pyth price feed.
It contains:
- `write_authority`: The write authority for this account. This authority can close this account to reclaim rent or update the account to contain a different price update.
- `verification_level`: The [`VerificationLevel`] of this price update. This represents how many Wormhole guardian signatures have been verified for this price update.
- `price_message`: The actual price update.
- `posted_slot`: The slot at which this price update was posted.

types.name: UFixValue64
docs: A value-space `Fix` where base is always 10 and bits are a concrete type.
Intended for serialized storage in Solana accounts where generics won't work.

types.name: VerificationLevel
docs: Pyth price updates are bridged to all blockchains via Wormhole.
Using the price updates on another chain requires verifying the signatures of the Wormhole guardians.
The usual process is to check the signatures for two thirds of the total number of guardians, but this can be cumbersome on Solana because of the transaction size limits,
so we also allow for partial verification.
This enum represents how much a price update has been verified:
- If `Full`, we have verified the signatures for two thirds of the current guardians.
- If `Partial`, only `num_signatures` guardian signatures have been checked.
# Warning
Using partially verified price updates is dangerous, as it lowers the threshold of guardians that need to collude to produce a malicious price update.

types.name: YieldHarvestConfig
docs: Captures yield harvest configuration as two basis point values:
